title: How to automate administrative tasks - Quora

response.answer_text: Using a cloud Workflow Suite, Flokzu for example. You can model using BPMN your administrative workflows and then automate it with just one click. Usually, companies have well solved the transactional part of their processes, for example in an ERP or a payroll system. With administrative processes, something different is happening. They are usually done by spreadsheets, emails, or directly on paper. The tools to automate these administrative processes were previously expensive and complex to install. The new trend is that tools called low-code / no-code, allow this automation in the cloud, in minutes, without complications, without technical skills, and affordable. In fact, there are pre-configured libraries of administrative processes, in order to accelerate their adoption. Just watch it running:  Best!
